Subskills.name: Solar Fireworks
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile amount of solar flare.

Subskills.name: Blue Flame Fire
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by solar flare.

Subskills.name: Grand Flare
Subskills.description: Unleash a grand flare frequently spawning smaller flares. Solar flare has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Rapidfire Cannoneer
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using solar flare.

Subskills.name: God Slayer
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bosses for solar flare.

Subskills.name: Explosive Flares
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash fiery explosions on hit if target is burning.

Subskills.name: Solar's Edge
Subskills.description: Monster kills grant you a stack of solar's edge increasing the damage and projectile amount of solar flare.

Subskills.name: Everburning Fire
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Solar Orbs
Subskills.description: Summon multiple small suns frequently unleashing solar flares. solar flare now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Flaming Hands
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of solare flare.

Subskills.name: Celestial Step
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using solar flare.

Subskills.name: Burst of Power
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase damage dealt and unleash additional solar flares.

Subskills.name: Sun's Orbit
Subskills.description: Summon solar flares orbiting you for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Searing Flares
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of projectiles inflicting fire break on hit.
